caption.p: The morphologies of worn surfaces lubricated by different lubricating mediums at various temperatures ( a) 350 °C, PAO; ( b) 450 °C, PAO; ( c) 600 °C, PAO; ( d) 350 °C, PAO_0.5 wt% Mg(ReO 4) 2; ( e) 450 °C, PAO_0.5 wt% Mg(ReO 4) 2; ( f) 600 °C, PAO_0.5 wt% Mg(ReO 4) 2 and the energy dispersive spectrometer (EDS) results of marked areas.
